featureDetails.featureDescription: Amazon GuardDuty Malware Protection for EC2 has added three Runtime Monitoring finding types that invoke automatic (GuardDuty-initiated) malware scans - Execution:Runtime/MaliciousFileExecuted, Execution:Runtime/SuspiciousShellCreated, and PrivilegeEscalation:Runtime/ElevationToRoot. AWS accounts that have the Malware Protection for EC2 feature enabled may observe malware scans being initiated when these findings are generated.
